original_text: We have prepared and consecrated all the articles that King Ahaz removed in his unfaithfulness while he was king. They are now in front of the Lord’s altar.”
korean_text: 또 아하스 왕이 왕위에 있어 범죄할 때에 버린 모든 그릇들도 우리가 정돈하고 성결하게 하여 여호와의 제단 앞에 두었나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: We have prepared and consecrated all the articles
that King Ahaz removed in his unfaithfulness
They are now in front of the Lord's altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 이제 주의 제단 앞에 있습니다
